QuestData.Title: Leave No Weapon Behind
QuestData.Description: Battle supplies are hard to come by on this rock. Every time we hold off another horde attack, it feels like we are fighting with sticks and stones.$B$BReports have come in that Keep Lord Farson on the north side of the island has a large stockpile of rifles that we could use. Can you head down there and check it out?$b$bBe careful $n, Farson's followers will do anything to protect him.
QuestData.LogDescription: Retrieve 12 Rusty Rifles from Farson Hold on the north side of Tol Barad Peninsula.
